item.title: Kenya Dollar Shortage Drives Away Investors
item.description: Kenya Dollar Shortage Drives Away Investors The Kenyan shilling has been depreciating against the US dollar, reaching a record low of 118 shillings to the dollar in April 2023. The depreciation of the shilling has made it more expensive for foreign investors to buy Kenyan assets, such as stocks and bonds.
